name: Redux (itch)
description:
A game made for the 2016 Scholastic Art and Writing competition. I didn't win. (Sad trombone)

Redux is a game where each time you beat a level, you have to play it again, with one less character to help you out. It's that simple! Puzzles change and must be completed in different ways with different numbers of characters. Includes 4 levels.

Controls:

A/D - Move left/right

W - Full jump

Hold spacebar - Charge special jump

Release spacebar - Execute special jump

S - Interact
